website_summaries.verdict: The 9700 is the upgrade many satisfied Norelco users seek. All of the best features of other models are incorporated, including wet/dry capability and advanced cleaning.
pros: Variable speed motor provides more comfortable shave
cons: Attaching the sideburn trimmer can be challenging
Blades snag and pull longer hairs

customer_reviews.title: will not honer there return policy
customer_reviews.text: when working it is great-----the problem being it quits shaving in the middle of shaving and you cant get working again for some time--the information offers a refund if post marked in 45 days I have been to their call in center 7 times and only get the run around. I provided all information including a copy of the bill I think they jack you around so you wont get the refund your entitled to
customer_reviews.author: John b

customer_reviews.title: ... -- no pulling at all and it cleans very easy, making it a winner
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING -- cuts a 3 day beard with ease as close as a razor -- no pulling at all and it cleans very easy, making it a winner. On the negative side, I kept an old razer with a trimmer on it, preferring a dedicated trimmer instead of the cheezy add-on trimmer that came with it AND it is significantly overpriced (probably due to its alleged movie labeling) and I removed one star for the two negatives.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSp

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different shavers over the last 30 years and I will say this is the best one I have ever owned. It works, and works great. No stray hairs, no breaking out the blade to clean up missed or tough to get hairs. This unit is top notch. Buy it, you wont reget it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Struck

customer_reviews.title: and this is an excellent razor. I have a very thick beard
customer_reviews.text: Take the star wars fan part aside, and this is an excellent razor. I have a very thick beard, and most electrics jam/break/fail to shave me. This razor does and excellent job on my beard, and even tackles it if i let if go 4-5 days (have to empty the head a couple times..lol). If you are asking the answer is YES, spend the money for the top line, the lower models don't cut it for a man like me.
customer_reviews.author: Galen U.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaver! I've always used electric shavers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaver! I've always used electric shavers. And always Norelco. This is the best yet! Definitely their flagship model. The star wars stuff is all aesthetic. The machine itself is Norelco's top of the line. I use it with shaving gel and water. It's the cleanest, closest, quickest shave I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Great Norelco Product
customer_reviews.text: Still has the high standard of quality, even with the "change of hands" to Phillips a decade or so ago. I was skeptical when the Phillips name started showing up. I've tried other razor brands, but have never found one I like, other than the Norelco shaver
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hello electric shaver!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it now for a week. Great close shave, love the cleaning system as well. Trued both dry shave and wet shave, can't decide which was better as they both were just great,, I spent the extra money as I was tired of using a straight razor after my electric didn't get close enough, good bye straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Razor.
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor. SOOOOO glad I can use my charger ALONE with my Razor now so I can take on trips. Also like that the trimmer attachment that I never used is seperate. Like the cleaning thing, but not sure I need it. Does take up a lot of space on the counter, which my wife does not like.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Dosier

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job, gave a clean shave.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but does not hold the charge like my older model. Battery only last 3-4 days. I will go for a whole week with the previous Norelco 3D.
customer_reviews.author: DR.RPB

customer_reviews.title: It's worth to spend a few bucks for a great shave.
customer_reviews.text: This electric shaver gives a smooth passing on my face wet/dry. I prefer to use shaving cream which feels more pleasant. I've being using Braun shavers and other foil shavers. But this rotary electric shaver really got me for good.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Circular Motion --- NOT
customer_reviews.text: After using the Phillips for a few weeks, I sent it back. I thought originally since the hair on your face grows in all directions that moving in a circular motion would have the best benefits, but that's not the case. It provide an OK shave, but not near as close as the Braun 7 Series.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: I can best compare this shaver to the Braun I used for ...
customer_reviews.text: I can best compare this shaver to the Braun I used for a couple of years. Truly all plusses. Namely: much, much quieter during all phases; closer shave. No, you can not yet compare it to a razor but it is getting close. If you can afford it then purchase it IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Argonaut Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the product that I bought. Fast delivered
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Antonio Grecco

customer_reviews.title: Short-Lived but Great Shaver Series
customer_reviews.text: My third in this series by Phillips. Tend to last about 3 years, which is a little short-lived for such an expensive shaver, IMHO. But, a great shave while it lasts. And it's not like anyone else is making anything even near as good.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Stanton

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shaver I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving with Norelco for years now and this is the best yet. The trimmer needs work but they could just produce a better trimmer that attaches to the same unit. I still give it five stars because this is the best electric shaver I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Trombly

customer_reviews.title: High quality !
customer_reviews.text: It is entirely a quality product ! Although , I have to charge it after 10 uses , but he just shaves in excellent condition. I think this is the best razor I had and I am very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Always_buying

customer_reviews.title: the shaving experience is not better or worse than the 8000 model from 6 years ...
customer_reviews.text: norelco people are clueless or doing it on purpose. why take away the trimmer? to force people buy a trimmer separately? it is a relief that they returned to the cord plug in charging system instead of the charging stand only design. no one wants to carry an extra stand in order to charge it when travelling. i dont mean 2 day business trip travelling, i mean pro longed visits to different places where you have to charge it after a month or so.... next model, keep the plug in charging, and put the trimmer back. btw, the shaving experience is not better or worse than the 8000 model from 6 years ago, personal opinion...
customer_reviews.author: George Z Wang

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement shave for an 11-year old of similar type. Loved the one I had and this one is virtually the same as the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS J BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome electric shaver. Fast, clear and long battery life
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Given that there is not that much difference in functionality between this shaver and the others from lower series I find the price is excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect-
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect shaver just needs a pop-up trimer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Came with 9800 charging base!
customer_reviews.text: The charging base included in the 9700 is supposed to be unique to this model as seen in the photo. My box included a 9800 charging base which is cheaper & does not display charging ring.
customer_reviews.author: CokePokes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shaver with Direct Charge Capability
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Amazing shaver and a great shave. Cleaner charger is quite large, but at least for travel you can charge the shaver without it. 8000 series required the little plastic stand which is a pain to keep track of when you're on the road.
customer_reviews.author: CTO Justin

customer_reviews.title: The best electric shaver, that I have ever used !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The closest shave that I have got with a electric shaver, and I have been using electric shavers for 45 yrs. I replaced a Philips Norelco sensor touch 3D.with the 9700.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best shaver ever! I had a Brawn Series 7 before. This Philips is far better!
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: The shaver is a magic.
customer_reviews.text: For people who is looking at the comment section, DON'T TRUST THESE NEGATIVE COMMENTS. This is the best shaver I have ever seen and used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: i have really sensative skin and have been looking for a shaving system to help... This is the smoothest system out there... My skin thanks you!
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: the design and engineering are very poor because the shaving head has to be removed each ...
customer_reviews.text: This razor gives a close shave, so far. I've only used it about one week. However, the design and engineering are very poor because the shaving head has to be removed each time one wishes to attach the side burn clipper. This is a nuisance because it is difficult to align the slot on the shave with the slot on the shaving head and the instructions say not to twist the shaver head. Instead of making things easier, Norelco made things harder and from what I can see, when it's time to change the blades, it's not an easy process of just snapping on a new razor head. The price is very high and the lack of convenience is troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A Levin

customer_reviews.title: However I like the shave it gives
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning the razor is labor intensive. However I like the shave it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Buller

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Wish I had purchased a ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Wish I had purchased a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Armistead

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving with a Norelco electric razor for 50 years. This is the best of the bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: At first was seems kind of uncomfortable on my face ...
customer_reviews.text: At first was seems kind of uncomfortable on my face but after 3 times shave, i must say still my first choice in any brand for shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Farbod Haghanegi

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE GARBAGE/ DOES NOT CUT
customer_reviews.text: What an expensive rip-off !!! I have used Norelco Triple head shavers for 30 years (3 during that time ). This is the second one I have recently ordered that does not cut my whiskers ! What has happened to this once great company ???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is well built and works like 1000 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Finally my face has stopped burning from razors, and my skin is clean and clear as this does not scrape your skin or very slightly if you press it hard on your skin. I clean the shaver every 4th or 5th use, although it says do it every time. No need.. I just take the razor top off and rinse that assembly from inside. no need to take the whole head off. This is well built and works like 1000 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: best for sharp looking face, I do not recommend for round shaped faces
customer_reviews.author: Jaemin H.

customer_reviews.title: it shiped to my home of beijing cost 12 days ...
customer_reviews.text: it shiped to my home of beijing cost 12 days ! but it works well ~ You're Worth It!
customer_reviews.author: johntech

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shaver made me start use eletric shavers after 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Excellant razer.
customer_reviews.text: An excellant razer. So much better then the Norelco I bought a couple of years ago. Usually an electric will not do good on my beard, but this one does very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wooster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if Philips Norelco can do better than this one ? great shaver.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After 1st change out of 'wash bowl' liquid this feature stopped working! FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Razor head pops out.
customer_reviews.text: Good shave but the razor head will not stay in, it keeps popping out while you I am shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: The horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Originally, this is the sweet gift for my father, so I deliveried to Taiwan quickly when I got this package. When my father opened it, the razor is a different model from the one I wanted. On the other hand, this package doesn't include the charger. This is an unbelievable mistake and I can't tolerate this. I request full refound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Pricey. The old Philips shavers are much better. Technology is nice but it is not an answer for a shaver that has to shave smooth and deep. I am disappointed and I put the machine aside using my old shaver that still do a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Sl

customer_reviews.title: Great razor. But at the price I hope it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great razor. But at the price I hope it last longer than my last Norelco. My last razor lasted 2 years and at $300 cost is about 41 cents a shave. Just seems expensive, not counting the cleaning solution and new razor head approx. 58 cents per shave total.
customer_reviews.author: David Hale

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst purchase I have ever made. It doesn't really cut. It pulls the hairs out most of the time. The necessity of changing cutting heads just to trim is an absolute joke. If you are wise, go to the dollar store and get theirs. At over $300.00 this an absolute joke.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Batur

customer_reviews.title: Earlier Norelcos would irate when shaving the neck. There ...
customer_reviews.text: Earlier Norelcos would irate when shaving the neck. There is no iratation with the 9700. Short learning curve. You have to learn not to press hard. As close as a blade.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to Save and leave unseen hairs
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shaver I have ever had. It takes for ever to shave my beard and leave hairs unshaven. The head is flimsy and after only a few months of use one of the blades will not stay locked in - it comes out on every shave. Also the side burns trimmer is a separate so you have to take of the head and put it on - what a pain. I liked the old Norelco's, so after my Braun wore out I thought why not try a new one - MISTAKE. Going back to Braun. I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: B Knapp Page

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor!
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is outstanding. This is the 4th Norelco electric shaver I have had and easily the best yet. Only issue is that I really didn't want the cleaning unit, but you have to pay for it to get the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and costly to maintain!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the 8000 series instead, this one is overpriced and uses expensive refill cartridges for cleaning. Also, ugly in stand as this one goes in backwards. Tricky to operate! I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: JoeBotts

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver, but my item looked like a refurbished item
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than my Braun. Shaves very close. I only gave it 4 stars because I bought this from Amazon and my unit seems like a "REFURBISHED", even though it's listed as NEW.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but would be better if the trimmer was not a separate piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Received the goods, feel very good, the packaging is not damaged, a very pleasant time to shop! PHILPS razor is also very comfortable. Have the opportunity to buy.
customer_reviews.author: jiangli

customer_reviews.title: it is better.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not equipped with a razor protective cover. if it can be equipped with one,it is better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: too expensive for such a quality shaving. the sides are not comfortable shave even trimmer. neck shaves bad ..
customer_reviews.author: Chermen

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend you money on junk.
customer_reviews.text: It is without a doubt the worst electric shaver I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No advantage over cheaper versions. It does not do a clean shave
customer_reviews.author: Antony Sankoorikal

customer_reviews.title: Hi tech. too much for this mature shaver
customer_reviews.text: I think norelco has gone too far in electric shaver tech. I bough this product, yet this super cleaning 'gismo', is hard for this 78yr old to ghasp. I am going to return it and get the best shave/with a BUILT in sideburn trimmer, and I've used norelco customer since i was able to shave.
customer_reviews.author: charles coyne

customer_reviews.title: So big the disegn for the cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting more for the high price that I paid It is messing a support for the shaver when we are not using it. Because the current smart cleaner is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: The best Norelco yet.
customer_reviews.text: I know $300 for a shaver seems excessive, but this is the best shaver I've ever had and this is about my 6th or 7th Norelco. The new double pladed heads really do the job and do so quickly and comfortably. The cleaning unit is probably not essential, but is bundled and works OK while recharging the shaver. I get at least 2 weeks, often more, from a single charge. Replacement heads are just the blades and screens but easy enough to replace and actually a little cheaper than for my previous (also high end) unit.
customer_reviews.author: RWT

customer_reviews.title: Closest Shave!!
customer_reviews.text: I just made a switch from the Panasonic ES-LV6N, as the blade replacement was about $120, when I was getting this for only $80 more, so it was a no brainer to purchase this and I am glad that I did. Within one minute it was able to clean my neck and face, which my Panasonic was not able to do so, so I also had to use Phillips Oneblade to clear up the neck hair. Overall I am happy with my purchase, and I recommend this shaver to anyone, that is looking to get a clean and close shave!!
customer_reviews.author: Hamsolo251

customer_reviews.title: Best $130 I've Spent In A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: Been a Norelco electric shaver guy for more than 30 years, but also own and use a Braun 9 Series for traveling. Didn't need a new razor this week...my Norelco 1280X is still an awesome beast after using it almost daily for the last 5+ years...but when Amazon dropped the price for this SW9700 to $130 for a couple of days this past weekend, I bought one "just in case". Used it this morning and loved it. I'm a wet-with-shaving-cream electric shaver user, and it was a good, close shave with no irritation afterwards. Easy clean-up. Best $130 I have ever invested in a razor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father, and he says the motor in it is super quiet-- compared to the other electric shavers in the past, he says it's like a ninja! Like all electric razors, he says this one is not as close of a shave as one would get with a 'real' blade, but the final result is still very good. It's very easy to use and doesn't result in any razor burn, tugging, or other facial discomfort. This is by far the best electric razor he's owned.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Really close/smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly close shave and quiet operation. Shaving time greatly reduced and actually enjoyable to use. Not sure yet about the cleaning function as to its effectiveness but the one piece shaving head needs to periodically be removed to remove hair. I find that using a can of compressed air works quickly and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: ... other Norelco products in the past and been very satisfied. However this model is an improvement over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Norelco products in the past and been very satisfied. However this model is an improvement over the past models. It is waterproof and can be used in the shower. it is easy to clean and can be done with hot water. It fits well in the hand and has 3 speeds depending on you beard length. I think the cleaner that came with it is a waste and after the cleaning product that came with it is gone, I doubt i will use it. However I could not find this 3 speed razor without the cleaning element. After all it can be easily cleaned with hot water. So i think the cleaning element is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stack

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best. Closer shave less noisy and you can truly ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. Closer shave less noise and you can truly use it wet versus my Braun series 9095 top of the line. Braun is advertised as wet but if you read closely states you could clean wet but not shave with gel or fosm in wet. I have not tried Panasonic but reviews stated Braun was best foil. I stopped using Panasonic ten years ago when closer shave meant cutting you every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Very close shave and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best electric shaver I have ever owned. It took my skin two days to get used to it but now it's as smooth as ice. Very close shave and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed with this top-of-the-line Phillips Norelco Shaver!
customer_reviews.text: It won't even hold a 3 hour charge to get through a 10 min. shave(it starts sputtering for lack of power). Every time I plan on using it, I fully charged it the last time I used it. But these efforts are a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning unit stopped working after the second cleaning. I now just rinse it under warm water and charge it only when it's dry. Don't want the hassle of trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnPip

customer_reviews.title: Shaves pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Good shaver. Cuts well, cuts close. Good battery life between charges. Cleaning system is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect by any means
customer_reviews.text: Shaves closer and with less irritation than most other electric shavers I've used. Not perfect by any means, but very good. The SmartClean system that comes with the shave is kind of a pain to set up, but when I use it, which I do twice a week, the shaver seems to be even less irritating than when I clean with plain hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Elag 1

customer_reviews.title: Very close shave
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shaver. It gives a very close shave.
customer_reviews.author: BKG

customer_reviews.title: Product Not Accurately Represented
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner washer does not have the segmented progress indicators as shown in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday.. He is like a kid with a new toy. He is retired and every once in a while I will glance over at him in his recliner and there he is using his new shaver...Then he comes over to me and says" See how smooth my face feels?". He is so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: The best Norelco has.
customer_reviews.text: All in all a decent razor. Electric shavers are at times difficult to get that fresh, close shave. I like the ultra sound cleaning part of it. It seems like it gets sanitized after a cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Panama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is the shaver I've been looking for. I've never been able to shave very often due to sensitive skin - but with this shaver it's no problem. The shave is super close with no razor burn.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Bonisseur de La Bath

customer_reviews.title: great close smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: great close smooth shave..only annoying part is the fact that you have to exchage the heads for a the clipper..cant understand why they couldnt just have a pop out one..maybe because of the self cleaning?..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Elec shaver I have ever had shaves as close as a razor Amazing
customer_reviews.author: sabadogee

customer_reviews.title: It's great that there's a gadget to clean it too
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. My husband wanted one with an indicator in front to tell you when the charge is full. Unfortunately, the old Norelco ones with that feature are no longer available in the market anywhere we looked. It's great that there's a gadget to clean it too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marinera

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Cuts close, quick, and comfortably. The self cleaning feature is so simple. Just put the shavers away in the holder and it gets cleaned whenever it needs to. Battery lasts 2 weeks plus and I always charge when I get down to 50% charge remaining.
customer_reviews.author: The Veritable Bugeater

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves this gift ....
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband. The latest of many Norelco shavers for him ...all he has ever used. He is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: Long hairs get pulled out and it hurts😢
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be too slow. Long hairs get yanked out causing some pain. JHL
customer_reviews.author: James H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The package arrived intact the packaging was excellent. The unit had about 10% charge and was ...
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived intact the packaging was excellent. The unit had about 10% charge and was fully charged in under an hour. The instructions were straightforward. I haven't tested the cleaner yet for obvious reason, but I expect it to be good if not excellent. The shave isn't as good as a Gillette blade but it is only day 1. It does take a bit to get used to going in a circular motion and stretching the skin and applying pressure with the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Madog

customer_reviews.title: Gave one as a gift and the recipient is very happy with theirs and I am quite happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two! Gave one as a gift and the recipient is very happy with theirs and I am quite happy with mine! I have had Norelco razors for over thirty years and of all of them this is the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beazell

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the shaver and 1 star for the SmartClean PRO System
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 9700 2 years ago. I like the shaver. The battery life (when traveling) is good...but...the "SmartClean PRO System" is awful...I have to fiddle with it everytime to get it to work, and it's super super easy to spill the cleaning solution if you slightly bump it. So 5 stars for the shaver and 1 star for the SmartClean PRO System.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Kinkier hair? Use it with cream, and it's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: If your facial hair is kinkier, this works best with some sort of lubricant. Because it can be used wet, even splashing your face with warm water will work better than using it dry. Using it with shave cream is best, as it will not only glide across your face, but will also provide a really close shave. As close as using a razor, but without the risk of cutting yourself or developing razor bumps. If you use it dry, plan on following up with a razor, or some other shave method. I'd definitely recommend this product for those with a more ethnic backgrounds.
customer_reviews.author: adamex2

customer_reviews.title: but pretty darn close and without the burn I used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as close as a razor, but pretty darn close and without the burn I used to get with the older electric razors.
customer_reviews.author: Sundeep S. Grewal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: After several months of trying to like this shaver I went back to my Brain Series 9. I will tell you it is quieter than the Braun and it does an ok job and really excels If you shave your head. I spent a lot and expected a lot. Better luck next time.
customer_reviews.author: Wj

customer_reviews.title: Best electric on the market...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norelco triple head shavers ever since I started shaving and they have been perfect. The last one I had was one of the cord/cordless models and I have had that one for almost 30 years. This one should last the rest of my life... I love the automatic cleaning system on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bassnote77

customer_reviews.title: and this shaver gives me the best shave i've ever had The only minor negative is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used several Norelco shavers over the years, and this shaver gives me the best shave i've ever had The only minor negative is the lack of a built in trimmer and the need to change the shaving head for the trimmer head to trim sideburns.
customer_reviews.author: FJA

customer_reviews.title: I had to order this razor after ordering a new ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this razor after ordering a new head for my old Norelco that was defective. I explained this by email to you but received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: So far they like them. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3. My two sons and husband. So far they like them. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbs10

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its not coming with all the parts as promised !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst model of this shavers line-up
customer_reviews.text: the heads on the shaver keep falling apart and I cannot get them to stay in as in the cheaper models of this shaver
customer_reviews.author: RTK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just as described , prompt shipping and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Van der Velde

customer_reviews.title: Very  poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 months before getting one of the floating heads broken despite very careful maintenance. Very slow shaving
customer_reviews.author: EDGARDO Z.

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 9700, S9721/84 Standard packaging
product_meta.description:
Style Name:OriginalOur most advanced shaving system, the Series 9000 cuts hairs up to 30% closer to skin with its V-Track precision blades. The shaving heads, with Contour Detect Technology, move in 8 directions to cut up to 20% more hair in a single pass.Handle:Ergonomic grip & handling

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
NOTE: Consumers experiencing an issue with this product should contact 1-800-243-3050 for assistance.
feature_bullets: Each shaving head moves in 8 directions for an extremely close result
The wet or dry electric shave system captures each hair regardless of its length from 1 day up to 3 day stubble
Choose the speed setting that best fits your skin and hair type: Slow (skin-friendly shave), Medium ( thorough shave), and Fast (high-powered shave)
The digital interface automatically lights up and showing: battery level, cleaning indicator, battery low indicator, replacement head indicator, and travel lock indicator
The SmartClean System allows for easy maintenance: cleans, lubricates, dries, and charges your shaver.
